story:
Our passion for teaching others about local and organic food inspired us to start growing for ourselves. Our first garden began as just one 12x4 raised bed in our back yard. We fell so in love with growing our own food, our garden space has now gone from one raised bed to 1/2 an acre. We wanted to share our passion with others, so we began to grow for our community. We started an urban CSA last year and this year have doubled our members. Our mission is to teach others that no matter where you live, you have the ability to grow your own food. We are growing so rapidly, it is now time to purchase our first tractor! This is where you come in. We are firm believers that indeed it does take a village. Please consider helping us to grow our dream and community by allowing us to purchase our tractor. We won't let you down!

If we do not raise the money needed, we will spend what we do earn making repairs to our equipment and farm vehicle. If we go over, we will be expanding our orchard to be able to add fruit to our CSA shares. 

If you are in Kentucky, please consider supporting your local farmers and our friends at Think Little by donating to their tractor project!

story:
KIWI CANNASSEUR | Hemp - Health - Happiness
www.cannasseur.co.nz

What has been accomplished so far?

  • Sourced quality affordable products
  • Created logo & designed website
  • Printed business cards

Where will the funds go?

  • Stocking products for online store
  • Paying fees to keep website live
  • Paying for the perks you receive in return for helping me to launch my online store

What will you receive?

We are reaching out to our community to help make this a reality and bring you high quality affordable hemp & health products. We wanted to make donating fun by offering cool perks for our supporters!

The Breakdown

$5: Social Media Shout-Out (donation)
$10: Lemon Tea Tree Hemp Lip Balm
$25: Hemp Seed Oil 250ml
$35: Kanuka Hemp Healing Balm 60g
$35: Frankincense Hemp Cleanser 100ml
$40: Rose Hemp Facial Blend 30ml
$40: Hemp Seed Protein Flakes 450g
$40: Hemp Seed Protein Powder 450g
$40: Hemp Seed Oil 500ml
$45: Hemp Seed Oil Capsules 240 1000mg
$45: Whole Cracked Hemp Seeds 500g
$75: Hemp Seed Oil 500ml & Hemp Seed Protein Flakes 450g Combo
$75: Hemp Seed Oil 500ml & Hemp Seed Protein Powder 450g Combo
$75: Hemp Seed Oil Capsules & Hemp Seed Protein Flakes 450g Combo
$100: Hemp Skin Care Trio

Risks & Challenges

There is the possibility that i may fail to raise the full $10,000, however you will still receive your perks for contributing if i do not reach my goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

This idea is possible because of the support receive from family, friends, and our community. Here are some ways that you can support!

  • Spread the word and make some noise about our campaign by liking our Facebook page and sharing on your wall!
  • Share our IndieGoGo Campaign!
  • Send us your ideas and what you would like to see on the website

    Your thoughts, questions, or suggestions are needed! Email me at:

    kiwi@cannasseur.co.nz

story:
Hi!  We're a volunteer group of neighbours who live on Chestnut Street, a unique little enclave in Old Ottawa East.  Chestnut's streetscape features modest post-war bungalows and tasteful two-story houses owned by young families and urban professionals. Many of us have renovated our homes, within the guidelines set by the City. 

However now we're witnessing a disturbing practice of ignoring all the boundaries set within the by-laws so new owners can demolish existing homes and build mammoth three-story apartment units. The City has been approving variances that are not in character with the street, not desired by residents, and are quickly reducing the financial value and enjoyment of our single-family homes. 
We are caring neighbours who appreciate our street's history and value, and we take great pride in our homes. We don't want to be dwarfed by looming, incompatible and over-sized development that blocks sunlight and skyviews. 
We want to preserve the unique character of our street by encouraging thoughtful development and meaningful urban evolution residents can be proud of decades from now. We encourage progressive development and multi-family dwellings, but we wholeheartedly believe developers must build within the development plan determined by the City. 
We are taking our fight to the Ontario Municipal Board to stop this over-development and save our street from this short-sighted practice, which could set a terrible precedent for over-development in surrounding neighbourhoods like yours. 
An OMB Appeal costs a lot of money, but it's worth it to stop putting profits before people. We're asking for your support in our campaign to stick to the guidelines our City has put in place to encourage compatible positive development, not money-making get-rich-quick infill schemes. Thank you!

story:
Why 4-Elements? 

The Greeks, along with many other cultures, used an elemental system to explain the nature of life, according to the Greeks; there were four major elements, earth, air, water, and fire which were viewed as more spiritual in nature.

Using the Greek classical elements, people tried to explain the nature of the world around them, many people believed that the elements worked in a way which promoted balance, and that disturbances in this balance were the root cause of things like natural disasters and health problems, for this reason correcting an imbalance of elements was considered critical for well-being.

We such as the ancient Greeks want to maintain the perfect balance of nature, and for that we give the best of ourselves to make our products, preserving the environment and contributing to the health and well-being of people.

Who we are:

We are Silvia Tapia and Toni Tapia; two young entrepreneurial promoters of this project; we are joined for the enthusiasm and the love for the art of bakery since it us comes from heritage.



Our Story Begins:

Back in 1984, the Tapia-Alapont family began in the fascinating art of bakery at the hand of our parents, uncles and grandparents in Algemesí, a small town in the sunny province of Valencia, located on the east of Spain at the seashore of The Mediterranean Sea.



Our family learned from one older marriage, owners of an antique bakery which had a wood fired brick oven, they taught them the craft of bakers to old-fashioned way, after them took this bakery business.



Due to the strong growth of the large factories of industrial bread during last years, many retail bakeries began to close, In view of this, we had an idea to use the expertise acquired for our family so that they work with us and together taking the alternative to large industrial bread factories, promoting the sustainable consumption of healthiest breads made with 100% organic products, naturally leavened with long fermentations, handcrafted, non-GMO and chemical-free, what to large bread factories cannot offer.


Innovative Bakery Concept:

Our idea consist in to train teams of young bakers committed to work to development of organic breads, which can manage bakeries, old restored, as well as of new creation, all forming part of a single cooperative society, do no forget that "Unity is Strength".

Each person that's incorporated to work together us, at the same time that receives their training, until to achieve the sufficient expertise to manage autonomously a bakery, included within a single cooperative, which will provide a large number of advantages, how to buy best price, support in the marketing of the products carry out joint marketing campaigns , better administrative management, as well as government aids and grants that receive this type of entities.



First we want open a pilot bakery* in Valencia (Spain) and after go opening more of a gradual manner.

Our intention is to transfer this project model in the near future to the United States, if it is carried out and consolidated first in Spain with succes; for this we need the support of American people who share the same ideas and are excited in this project; then we will can share the experience gained in its implementation and consolidation.

If all goes as planned, we will be ready to start activity in February 2016.

*Currently we haven't bakery of our property, but we want to rent one shortly.

Know-how:

The bread was made using an millenary method, using only a mixture of flour, water, salt and natural leaven, until the bakers start to utilize a microscopic fungus, called Saccharomyces cerevisiae (Mautner process, Austria 19th century, concretely in 1846), giving rise to mass production of industrial  processes, shortening the fermentation to the detriment of the quality.


We produce bread following a method that dates back to thousands of year, to make our daily bread, we first prepare our natural liquid leaven, on the basis of a culture of lactic acid bacteria and wild yeasts contained into it, which we refresh daily adding more flour and more water in order to nourish this culture and thus keep it live; thereafter the ferment taking about eight hours for optimal ripening.



We elaborated unhurried, investing time that bread needed for to develop aromas and flavors of natural form as well as natural organic compounds that make the bread more digestive, nutritious and healthy.



After kneading we ferment the dough at a temperature conducive to the proliferation of lactic acid bacteria and wild yeasts which is when develop aromas and flavors of bread, after this bulk fermentation, we started with bread making process handmade to confer a texture and a honeycombed crumb that using mechanical methods are not obtained.




Finally after the last fermentation, called proofing, (the final rise of shaped bread dough before baking) we unload the unbaked dough loaves over the stone floor oven for a thicker and crispy crust.




From the first refreshing of the Leaven (Sourdough) to coming out of the oven, our bread takes around 18 hours to be produced.


Values:

The origin of the raw material



For the elaboration of our bread, we only use organic ingredients: Flour*, mineral water, unrefined sea salt and a culture of lactic acid bacteria and wild yeasts contained in our natural liquid leaven also called Sourdough, Levain or Mother Dough.




Our special breads: Rosquilletas (Valencian breadsticks) and rolls we produce with flour* , mineral water, unrefined sea salt, natural liquid leaven, extra virgin olive oil, seeds and aromatic Mediterranean herbs, all of these of organic origin.

*Organic stone ground grain flours (whole and white): Wheat, rye, spelt, kamut and Multigrain. 



Another Valencian specialty know since the century XVll is La Pataqueta d'Horta (Bread of the Valencian Orchard) were made by the farmers and baked in small wood fired brick oven that were next to the “barracas” (cabin of farmer).

This bread is similar to the Italian Ciabatta but with a Lima Bean Shape, characterized by high water content and honeycomb crumbstructure with irregular open cells.



Naturally Leavened Bread makes a difference

This type of fermented breads with natural leaven provides great advantages compared to industrial bread fermented with industrial yeasts produced massively, which brings high profitability at the expense of quality.


The first advantage it offers is gastronomic, because the flavor and aroma is incomparable.

Second: the industrial yeast causes that bread acquires by the simple formation of gas (CO2) the texture similar to of a sponge, while the fermentation process with natural leaven in addition has a modifying effect in the flour breaking down proteins into amino acids, turning it into more digestible.

Third: it is known that certain substances such as phytates *, especially present in the bran cereals, they unfold thanks to the natural leaven forming compounds much more healthy.

* The phytic acid or phytates can be mixed with certain minerals and impede or inhibit its absorption. This happens for example with iron (whose deficiency causes anemia) or with copper (which stimulates immunity). Many anti-nutrients (which impede the absorption of some nutrients).


Fourth: The glycemic impact of Naturally Leavened Bread is low as compared to commercial yeast, aiding in ensuring that your blood glucose level remains in line, helping to guard against various diseases such as diabetes.

Fifth: the ideal bread, fermented with natural leaven, has a crust more crunchy, irregular honeycomb and preserved several days without staling.



Sustainable development

Eco-friendly product: Maximum respect for the environment.

Energy consumption: Use of clean and renewable energy; the energy required to heat the oven is mainly obtained from solid biomass comes mainly from wood remains of forestry, forestry and recycling of wood industries, the use of biomass as fuel does not increase the content of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere and, therefore, not attributed the greenhouse effect; other energy used to a lesser extent is the electricity for the bread fermentation chamber and some small machines.




Recycling:Fully recyclable packaging, using recycled materials.




Environmental impact: Practically null for the proper management of waste, use of renewable and clean energies, together with a system of filters installed in the chimney of the oven whose fully developed technology and known operates with very high yields and, therefore, get withhold percentages very high total of generated particles.



Transportation: Logistics rational and structured



Strategy:

Importance of Spread the Sales Points

This allows us to develop a network of elaboration and sale points increasing, where people can purchase your organic bread freshly baked at an affordable price.

This product in Spain so far only found on the shelves of health food stores, already baked and packaged and some in specialty bakeries widely scattered from each other, both sold at high prices.


Creating jobs

The young bakers teams trained by us, in near future they will manage bakeries of new creation, as well as restored old bakeries, them will forming a network of bakeries that it will grow by the support of a single cooperative society, that will increase the jobs of gradually manner.

The Market

The organic food products market in Spain will grow by 25% by year until 2020, according to Everis*.

Therefore "we are in the right place at the right time"

Among the main barriers to domestic growth in the sector are the high price, lack of awareness and the difficulty of finding organic products outside of specialized shops.



*Everis is a multinational consulting firm providing business and strategy solutions, application development, maintenance, and outsourcing services. Established in 1996,everis has averaged 20% annual growth in revenues and became part of NTT Data in January, 2014.



The main global market is the United States, which consume organic products worth of 21.038 Millions of €, while Spain is the seventh European place and tenth worldwide.




The rise in consumption of organic products in Spain is above average increase in the world market, looking to the future the Everis* report highlights that the Spanish market for organic products will grow around 25% annually until 2020 and could reach to 12.182 Millions of €, of the total expenditure on organic food, the buying of organic bread represents 5.74%, i.e. 699.246.800 €.


Annual growth rate turnover of organic market in Spain

What We Need

For we can to start, we need to buy the special equipment required for making Naturally Leavened Breads with organic raw materials we need your support for to reach the figure of $55.000 with the hope of being able to overcome it.

This equipment is composed by:

  • 1 Fermenter for Natural Leaven of 120 Liters: $17.200  
  • 1 Retarder Proofer of 1.300 loaves of Capacity: $20.000
  • 10 Stainless steel storage trolley: $520 x 10 = $5.200
  • 1 Hydraulic Dough Divider: $5.900
  • 1 Double Arm Dough Kneader 50 kg Dough: $6.700

Note: The oven and other equipment are already available in the bakery that we will take for rent.

If the campaign will surpass the $55.000, the rest of the money will be intended for a good advertising campaign to inform people about the benefits provided by to consume organic breads.

If the campaign doesn’t  reach the $55.000, we adapt the equipment and production depending on the funds raised.

What You Get

Dear backers, we have selected a range of perks for to thank you contribution shown in the right margin of the page.

You can to send your contribution in two ways:

a-By credit card (credit or debit) and bank account (Secure Bank Account)

b-Quickly and securely online using a credit card (credit or debit) or bank account through PayPal from your smartphone, using PayPal's mobile app.

Thank you so much for your consideration.

Note: in the case of any article  was not available, this will  be replaced by another with similar features.

Please , visit our blog for more information about sizes, colors, quality, etc.

http://www.4-elements-organic.com/p/indiegogo-crowdfunding.html

The Impact of You Support

We will contribute with your support to spreading a so beneficial product for people; this type of product currently in Spain is acquired at high prices, principally in special organic stores and very specialized bakeries that are widely dispersed from each other.

We will contribute to people having easy accessibility and more reasonable prices, at the same time as we will create jobs of gradually manner.

Risks & Challenges

The spreading quickness of our products of bakery will depend on the time that people need for to be aware of the great benefits that contributes, both in health as a gastronomically, and since then increase the demand.

We are convinced that this will happen in a short period of time, because the media have begun to document the population of the great benefits they bring to the health of organic products.

The most prestigious consulting firms forecast that deadline for people take aware and consume more products natural and organic will happen in the short term of five years, with an annual growth of 25%.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute the campaign financially, you can help greatly sharing this link and video with everyone you know - on your website, on your blog, on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, Instagram, and all other social media platforms.

Working together we can change the course of things for a world better.

Thank you so much for considering our project!

Note: The oven and other equipment are already available in the bakery that we will take for rent.



If the campaign will surpass the $55.000, the rest of the money will be intended for a good advertising campaign to inform people about the benefits provided by to consume organic breads.



If the campaign doesn’t  reach the $55.000, we adapt the equipment and production depending on the funds raised.
What You Get 



Dear backers, we have selected a
range of perks for to thank you contribution shown in the right margin of the
page.

You can to send your contribution in two ways:

a-By credit card (credit or debit) and bank account (Secure Bank Account)

b-Quickly and securely online using a credit card (credit or debit) or bank account through PayPal from your smartphone, using PayPal's mobile app.

Thank you so much for your consideration.


Note: in the case of any article  was not available, this will  be replaced by another with similar features.

Please , visit our blog for more information about sizes, colors, quality, etc.
http://www.4-elements-organic.com/p/indiegogo-crowdfunding.html
The Impact of
You Support
We will contribute with your
support to spreading a so beneficial product for people; this type of product
currently in Spain is acquired at high prices, principally in special organic
stores and very specialized bakeries that are widely dispersed from each other.
We will contribute to people
having easy accessibility and more reasonable prices, at the same time as we
will create jobs of gradually manner.
Risks
& Challenges
The spreading quickness of our products
of bakery will depend on the time that people need for to be aware of the great
benefits that contributes, both in health as a gastronomically, and since then
increase the demand.

We are convinced that this will
happen in a short period of time, because the media have begun to document the
population of the great benefits they bring to the health of organic products.
The most prestigious consulting firms
forecast that deadline for people take aware and consume more products natural
and organic will happen in the short term of five years, with an annual growth
of 25%.
Other Ways You
Can Help
If you cannot contribute the campaign
financially, you can help greatly sharing this link and video with everyone you
know - on your website, on your blog,
on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, Instagram, and all other social media platforms. 
Working together we can change the
course of things for a world better.
Thank you so much for considering our
project!

story:
We're ready to take the next step.

Almost 4 years ago, we presented our community with an idea and a challenge: We asked you to help us take young.black.nappy. from a few digital designs on one Black girl's laptop to a full-fledge t-shirt line. And we did it together! 

In just 60 days, we raised over $2400 with more than 3 dozen backers receiving stickers, t-shirts, and more as tokens of our gratitude.

In those four short years, we have grown our brand and our message of pride is pretty! and pride is power! to over 17k brothers and sisters who have become a part of our global digital family. 

Now it's time to take our community of young, Black independent artists to the next level! Since the launch, our founder - Krystle Sims-Cameron - has gotten married, had a baby (#KingKhaliq if you're on Instagram!) and moved cross-country. With her feet firmly planted in the West Coast and a supportive, creative network behind her, she'd now like to grow the ybn platform and increase the organization's ability to inspire a sense of pride and power both online and within communities across the world.

That's where you come in!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to be completely self-sufficient, young.black.nappy. will need to be able to produce hand-printed merchandise (like t-shirts and totes) as well as other accessories like buttons, jewelry, and stationery. Since our heritage is in apparel, we'd like to start with a screen-printing press; bringing our shirt-printing process 100% in-house will allow us to quickly turn around custom orders, maintain inventory for community events, and provide printing services to local artists at drastically reduced prices. It will also make the majority of our production chain black-owned, female-owned, and community-serving. The things we'll be purchasing with the donated funds include:

  • Advanced Screen Printing Courses to increase our printer's skill set [$250]
  • Two-Station 4-Color Printing Station to print up to 12 shirts per hour [$1150]
  • Other Printing Supplies such as screens, inks, an exposure unit, etc. [$350]
  • Raw Materials including t-shirts, tote bags, and other printables [$750]
  • Vending Set-Up to bring our show on the road with a tent and signage [$1000]


The Impact

Our mission at young.black.nappy. remains the same as the day we were created on a scratch sheet of notebook paper in New Orleans: young.black.nappy. (ybn) is a company dedicated to promoting positive images of young, talented Blacks with naturally curly, kinky, wavy, and nappy hair. we believe in the beauty of Black people and encouraging our kings and queens to be proud of their hair-itage as they productively impact their communities. ybn strives to educate, uplift, and unify our community through art, music, travel, fashion, and humor. pride is pretty, pride is power. 

But we've learned quite a bit about ourselves and our world since then. We realize now that our dreams will only come true if we a) tap into the power and energy of the Black community that supports us and b) become self-sustaining enough to make the decisions that feel right for us and our people without consequence. In order for our message of pride, creativity, and unity to reach our audience, we need help from the folks who already know and love us. (That's y'all.) 

With help from your contribution, young.black.nappy. intends to:

  • Empower Black children by providing literature and art that shows them the beauty of their ancestry, skin, and hair
  • Instill and promote Black pride with creative and stylish apparel and accessories
  • Support independent Black artists with the education, products, and platform to reach and inspire their audiences

Risks & Challenges

As with all ventures, this one comes with a list of challenges we will need to overcome (but overcoming is what we do, ain't it?):

  • Time to print & promote. Our operation is a small one (plus our founder has a full-time job, a toddler, and just 24-hours in a day). Finding the time to execute all of our plans has often been a challenge, but we've taken steps to put  a dedicated team in place so that ybn is no longer a one-woman show.
  • Money for equipment and raw materials. What we're asking for in this campaign is the bare minimum we need to get started. The intent is to use this money to make more money - giving us the ability to be self-sustaining while we do the work we've been inspired to do. Without reaching this initial monetary goal, we won't be able to build the model we've envisioned.
  • Influence to get our message farther than it's ever been before. With over 17,000 followers, fans, readers, and customers, we know that ybn has a message that resonates with our community - but we need you to share it 2x a day to make sure your friends and family know we're here and why.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're down for the cause but just don't have the funds to contribute, there are other very important ways you can help:

  • Share, Share, Share! Please tell everyone you can about who we are and what we're doing. If they dig it, maybe they'll donate to the cause!
  • Visit our Website, Facebook Page, and Twitter We love to hear from you! Your belief in our message is what keeps us going, so stop by and say Hi! - it means more than you know :)

Thank you for your support! And, no matter what, remember that Pride is pretty! Pride is power!

story:
Who We Are?

    

Ordinary Entrepreneurs Limited is a global full digital marketing consultancy which specializes in LinkedIn authority branding, positioning and publishing solutions, as well as in automation tools for entrepreneurs and businesses worldwide.

www.ordinaryentrepreneurs.com is a subscription based website. We offer various subscription levels depending on the type of software and/or service that an entrepreneur or a business may need in order to automate their marketing and advertising processes online.

You can see our subscription levels here.

Over the years, the company has managed to successfully develop and grow over 300 niche websites in more than 40 fields with a total monthly audience of over 25,000,000 active readers . Our social media fans count is over 5,000,000 spread on various social media platform like Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest.

For the past 7 years, the company has consulted hundreds of what so-called "influencers", global leaders and companies to better position themselves and companies in the largest business network in the world - LinkedIn.

The Product

Our LinkedIn Auto Messaging Software was born out of the rapidly growing interest of businesses for LinkedIn automation tools.

Our product is a break-through technology that allows businesses and individuals like marketers, public speakers, entrepreneurs to effectively generate new leads and instantly drive more sales. 

What's the different between our software and all the software on the market?

Compared to all other LinkedIn software available on the market, our software actually generates you money. None of the current software on the web can offer you that!

LinkedIn Autopilot tells you they will increase your LinkedIn Profile rank. So what? If this ranking doesn't bring you money on the table, what's the point of using it on a monthly basis?

Why for LinkedIn?

With over 384,000,000 users LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. 

More than 80% of the LinkedIn members are considered key decision makers compared to Facebook.

Compared to other social networks, members on LinkedIn have more trust in the professional information they receive on LinkedIn – 82% for LinkedIn compared to 28% and 23% for Twitter and Facebook!

Bottom line: When you are using LinkedIn, you are dealing strictly with high-caliber professionals willing to connect and do business with you.

LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.

Our Linkedin Auto Messaging software has 2 essential functions to fully automated your leads generation needs:

1) Message to Group Members: Allows you to send direct message to each group member (with subject and body) to ALL members of selected groups automatically.* - Limited messages due to LinkedIn policies changes
2) Message to all your contacts/connections (no limitations to the number of daily messages that you can send!)

See for yourself how it works:


Features:

* Personalized messages (replaces [FIRST_NAME] by actual name)
* Ability to Pause/Resume from last stopped point ( may be aborted by user, or by unexpected errors like browser crash)
* Simulates user interactions automatically (to avoid getting blocked by Linkedin)
* Customizable Delay + Random variation = Delay between each message sending
* Creates Logs/Reports of each message sent.
* Doesn’t disturb normal browsing activities
* Elegant Design

Recent updates 
-Ability to save messages(subject and body templates) into list.
-Ability to start from given page and member index

Requirements:

* Google Chrome Browser
* Any OS with chrome installed

Software FAQ and specifications

1. How Do I Make Money Using Your Software?

It's really simple. Whether you use the software for personal purposes or you have a sales team, you can use your/their accounts and build your network and get in touch with your relevant audience. Once you've built your network you can now start approaching your leads. We give you the tools(the software) and it's up to you how effectively you will use it. If you are not good at sales or marketing, hire a specialist to write you messages and test them out.

The software has been tested on tens of accounts generating instant results and respectively revenue. 

2. I have heard that LinkedIn limits the number of messages that could be sent to group members. Is this software capable of overcome that?

Yes! After spending years on research and development, we have found a way which allows you to send unlimited number of messages to any group members. Even if you get “You are no longer authorized to message to this member” message, the software can send message without any problem. So you don’t have to worry about that.

*Hot Tip: Keep the count below 50-100 per day.

3. Does it work on Mac OS

Yes, it works on any OS that supports Google Chrome browser. It is a Google chrome extension ( which is not available on Google Play store).

See what some of our happy clients have to say about our product:





What Do We Need and Why Are Why Promoting This Product through Indiegogo?

The product was launched at the beginning of August and we believe that more businesses should know about it. This is your great opportunity to automate your sales and online revenue at a very special early bird price!

Why do we need $10,000 and how will this money be spent?

So far we invested over $35,000 in the development of the product. We would like to compliment our existing and new clients(you) with new features and better user friendly interface. 

  • $5,000 will be spent towards the development of new features
  • $5,000 will be spent towards the development of the current features and for fixing any bugs and/or new restrictions that LinkedIn may place for sending messages.

What is in for you?

  • Early access to our LinkedIn automation software + a lifetime LinkedIn Automation Software support & updates membership on our website www.ordinaryentrepreneurs.com. Cost of the perk: $250 (normal price on www.ordinaryentrepreneurs.com is $700!)
  • Enrollment in our LinkedIn Influencer Programme - pricing varies. Learn more about the program here.


  • Sponsored Twitter & Facebook Shoutouts to total of 5 million fans spread on several viral Facebook and Twitter pages in exchange of your support!
See some of our accounts:


  • Marketing tools membership on our website(paid 1 year in advance - normal monthly subscription price: $199). Learn more about our subscription levels and what is in for you using this perk, please click here.

What is your LinkedIn Influencer Programme all about?


LinkedIn is the largest business network in the world. Its publishing platform – Pulse is becoming more and more popular among managers, executives, entrepreneurs, marketers, public speakers, and businesses. The idea of becoming an “Influencer” and getting your post seen by millions of business and recruitment oriented audience becomes more lucrative.

Why?

Because it gives once in a lifetime opportunity to change your life, drive millions in sales, position yourself and business as a leader on the market, connect to investors, potential partners, get a new job, or hire a talent for your company!

Our programme will help you to reach your goals. We don’t and can’t say that it is easy to become influential, but with hard work, plus our help, and your dedication, we can do miracles! Our programme requires a dedication and a contract with us for at least 6 months. This way, we can assure that you get the best traction and results within your goals, deadlines and ideas.

This service is not cheap, but if you are on this page, you clearly understand its value – money don’t buy everything. The unlimited opportunities that will come to you can’t be measured. We will guide you and be helping you all the way to reaching your business goals.

FAQ:

Q: Why should I choose you?

A: After 7 years of successfully consulting and positioning entrepreneurs, executives, marketing gurus, public speakers, and businesses, we have a proven track of positioning and authority branding individuals. We currently run 10 LinkedIn marketing websites. We partner with a number of reputation management firms in the United States and the United Kingdom.

Q: Who should participate in this programme?

A: This programme is perfect for individuals and businesses planning to build authority branding, drive more traffic to their websites; individuals who want to generate more leads, get new business opportunities, and drive more sales.

Q: Why your program lasts for 6 months?

A: Millions of people and businesses are now realizing the power of LinkedIn Pulse and what is the added value that Pulse brings them to the table: new business opportunities, more revenue, higher rankings in Google, Yahoo and Bing searches. What most of them don’t realize or understand is how to become popular on Pulse and how to increase your ROI by using it. Well, we specialize in just that.

We have the blueprint and we are here to help you. Our programme lasts for 6 months because our experience clearly shows that getting to the influencer status and getting your Pulse articles picked by LinkedIn takes time, dedication, and money investment. However, the results are invaluable!

Q: If I apply for your program and pass the full programme, what’s next for me?

A: This is not the end for you. We will be here for you and we will help you to continue to maintain and develop your public status on LinkedIn. This is how we build strong business relations based on trust, results, and transparency.

Q: How does the payment work?

A: All of our Programme Plans require 1-time payment. After you complete the payment, we will get in touch with you within 1-2 Business Days with more details on how to start.

Q:Why do you ask for so much money in advance? Can’t I just pay on month-to-month basis?

A: Our programme requires dedication, time, and energy. We believe that if we are committed to work with you and provide the best possible outcome for you, the programme won’t work for you for only 1 month. Best results come within the first 3 to 6 months. Please feel more than welcome to try our Free Trial service*.


What happens after I order any of your perks?


1) If you chose to pay with Paypal:
  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@ordinaryentrepreneurs.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)
2) If you chose to pay with your credit/debit card:
  • We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@ordinaryentrepreneurs.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

We have already made the big step investing time and over $35,000 in this project. It's time to make it full available to the business world. We won't be able to make it without your support. 

Testimonies from happy clients about our consultancy work and software:

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you for your support. New risks and challenges will pop up throughout this project. Our next step is to continue developing our existing product and find new clients among the way.

A: This is not the end for you. We will be here for you and we will help you to continue to maintain and develop your public status on LinkedIn. This is how we build strong business relations based on trust, results, and transparency.
Q: How does the payment work?
A: All of our Programme Plans require 1-time payment. After you complete the payment, we will get in touch with you within 1-2 Business Days with more details on how to start.
Q:Why do you ask for so much money in advance? Can’t I just pay on month-to-month basis?
A: Our programme requires dedication, time, and energy. We believe that if we are committed to work with you and provide the best possible outcome for you, the programme won’t work for you for only 1 month. Best results come within the first 3 to 6 months. Please feel more than welcome to try our Free Trial service*.



What happens after I order any of your perks?


1) If you chose to pay with Paypal:

We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.

Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@ordinaryentrepreneurs.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)


2) If you chose to pay with your credit/debit card:


We will be able to complete and/or deliver all the perks at the beginning of November, 2015 after Indiegogo clears the payments.
Optional: If you don't want to wait until the beginning of November, 2015, we can also deliver all perks instantly, but you will have to get in touch with us at info@ordinaryentrepreneurs.com to settle the payment and discuss your requirements(depending on the perk you choose eg. Influencer Programme, etc.)



    Risks & Challenges  We have already made the big step investing time and over $35,000 in this project. It's time to make it full available to the business world. We won't be able to make it without your support. 

Testimonies from happy clients about our consultancy work and software:



   Other Ways You Can Help 
We thank you for your support. New risks and challenges will pop up throughout this project. Our next step is to continue developing our existing product and find new clients among the way.

story:
Everyday we are all exposed to thousands of chemicals in common consumer products which are assumed to be safe until proven otherwise. And everyday we learn more and more about the unforeseen consequences to human health and the environment that many of these ingredients cause. After my own personal cancer scare, I became committed to inventing healthy alternatives to useful things that touch many people. There is no better example than flowers. 


FLORAL SOIL™ vs CHEMICAL FOAM

  • 100% renewable resources                      Made from phenol formaldehye
  • Free of synthetic chemicals                      Derived from fossil fuels
  • Fossil Fuel Free                                              Not re-usable
  • Multiple re-use options                               Does not naturally biodegrade     
  • Readily biodegrades/composts              More info  (see CA Prop 65)                        organic soil nutrient      

INNOVATIVE WASTE-FREE DESIGN



FEATURES

  • Made from sustainably sourced food grade organic materials
  • Naturally mimics structural and hydration features typical of chemical foams
  • Composition provides trace nutrients for seeds and cuttings
  • Foam like texture readily absorbs water without over saturation

CUT FLOWER DESIGNS
  • Structural support
  • Hydration

PLANT CUTTINGS

  • Soilless PH stable media
  • Trace micronutrients
  • Natural ability to accumulate and slowly release added fertilizers

SEED PROPAGATION

  • Containerless seed propagation
  • No messy soil spills
  • Lower water requirements during germination process

What We Need 

The busiest holiday season for chemical foam use is only a month away. We need your help with equipment upgrades to get to market. Our target is $25,000 but every dollar impacts our manufacturing capability.


Rewards For Your Support

FOREVER BOTANICAL CUPCAKES™ MADE FOR YOU - $25

Why cupcakes? 
Cupcakes are fun! We wanted to create the ulimate Floral Soil™  experience and design something that reflects our efforts to produce a truly safe and sustainable alternative to traditional chemical flower foams. 
 Get creative with your own DIY designs or we will make them for you!

DIY FOREVER BOTANICAL CUPCAKE™ Kits - $15


5X5 FLORAL SOIL™  BOTANICAL CENTERPIECE KITS - $35


RECYCLED PALLET BOX W/30 CUPCAKES - $75

For those of you who are inspired to create your own designs, we organized a bulk pack of DIY Floral Soil™ cupcakes. 
 Get a head start on those holiday gift ideas! 
  • Includes 30 DIY cupcakes
  • A super sturdy recycled pallet box w/handles for transport and next year's garden projects.

FLORAL SOIL ™  100% RECYCLED T-SHIRTS - $25


Floral Soil™ partnered with RETHINK Fabrics to design the perfect t-shirt. They are from 100% post-consumer recycled water bottles (rPET). At least 8 bottles avoid the ocean and landfill everytime a RETHINK shirt is made. 
  • A return to simplicy - Symbolizes our innovative approach to design products aligned with the ethical ethos and transparency desired by consumers. 
  • #letitgrow- Floral Soil™ has been designed for re-use, suitable for plant propagation or as an organic soil nutrient. It won't be wasted in a landfill. 

FLORAL SOIL ™  #letitgrow Aprons - $25

 Wear your Floral Soil™  support in style!  Floral Soil™  aprons are great for the kitchen or crafting. 

  • Black  w/3 pockets
  • Made from organic cotton and recycled polyester (PET)

The Impact

Floral Soil™ is manufactured 25 minutes North of Seattle, WA. The entire process is done in-house, all our feedstock is supplied by local or Pacific Northwest small businesses. We are the only " green" flower foam alternative in the world.

  • With your help, we can make up to 200,000 bricks for the holiday season
  • Create new jobs
  •  200,000 fewer chemical exposures to friends, family and florists
  •  200,000 fewer bricks in the landfill 
  • Over 40,000 lbs of organic soil nutrients introduced into the soil when composted.
  • You directly impact our ability to scale production to meet US & Canada demand for 2016

In the Media


Sustainable Seattle 

Fleurty Fleurs Blog

Floral Today Blog

Bonny Doon Garden Company Blog


Testimonials 

“I loved my floral arrangement made with Floral Soil™. The flowers held up very well for nearly two weeks and required very little water compared to the green foam. The Floral Soil™ was re-used and we now have various forms of mint, basil, oregano and English cucumbers growing. Each plant originated in “Floral Soil™” as either a cutting or seed and was transferred to larger outdoor planters on my deck. It is a real treat to see plants growing and thriving in something that would have normally thrown away. ”

- Judy S., Bellingham, WA

“I’m really impressed with Floral Soil’s performance and flexibility. I had a floral arrangement made for my daughter’s baby shower. After about 10 days, the old flowers were removed and others added to the same foam. The second arrangement lasted for another 10-12 days. After the two arrangements had gone, I took cuttings from my fuschia plant and inserted them into the foam. Root formation was evident about four days later and now they are starting to bloom. ”

- Robin J., Everett, WA


"These Floral Soil™ cupcakes are not only artistic, quirky and creative - they are a powerful statement of what is possible when you begin with non toxic and wholly beneficial materials borrowed from nature as your start point of sustainable product manufacturing." 

- Kristen M., Seattle, WA 


" A product that can be used and reused for floral design, seed and cuttings propagation, and then eventual soil enrichment when it is "used up" would seem to be as good as it can get for real sustainability all while replacing the currently used petroleum based foams. Being in the floral industry we can't wait to start using this product. Hope to see it on the market asap. Yea Mickey Blake!"

- Eric G., Bellingham, WA

Risks & Challenges

Small scale production of Floral Soil™ has been underway for 9 months. The funding we are seeking  is to help scale our over-all production capability. These small parts will have minimal impact on our current infrastructure.

 No part of the manufacturing process is outsouced. All of our materials excluding the cupcake box are sourced locally or in the Pacific Northwest where we are located. We designed the product, process and the equipment. 

The risks are minimal and we have a team in place to begin immediate production if successfully funded.

story:
Legacy of compassion

Nature's Apothecary will be a medical cannabis cultivation facility, dispensary and infusion kitchen.  Our mission is to provide, quality, naturally grown, healthy and safe medical cannabis for patients in the Kansas City, Missouri area.

I'm Julita Latimer and I have dedicated myself to Nature's Apothecary for over a year. What started as curiosity about the medical cannabis industry quickly grew into compassion for patients without access to the medical benefits of cannabis. In the process of learning about the medical cannabis industry I became a patient advocate as well an advocate for the reform of cannabis laws advocate. I joined the board of Norml KC, became a member of Show-me cannabis and helped collect signatures for New Approach Missouri medical cannabis initiative. 

Why we need you

  •  To be awarded a license, an application is submitted to the state and  then scored by using a merit base system. The merit system makes this part of the process highly competitive because there are a limited number of licenses to be granted. To be competitive I need to hire a cannabis business consultant, lobbyist and an attorney. Their skills are critical to crafting an ambitious  application.  A strong team now,  pushes us closer to the goal of Nature's Apothecary.
  • To achieve our goals we need you to contribute, and to say thank you we have several nice perks available. But what you really get is the satisfaction of knowing you helped bring a better quality of life to patients in need.


Nature's Apothecary will have a tremendous impact on the community by establishing access to medical cannabis to patients. It will be an honor to help our clients create a better quality of life. To serve them with honesty, dignity and integrity. We are also going to make less of an impact on the planet by creating a sustainability program. Growing in greenhouses and having a strategic energy plan for the cultivation facility, will leave a much smaller carbon foot print on the environment. Nature's Apothecary wants to be a shining example of how the medical cannabis industry can be a positive force in the community. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute please share your support with those that might be able to help financially.

story:
What's the Project Goal?

We are reaching out to our community to help fund the dream! Help bring something fun, new and down right funky to DC. We've got less than 60 days to raise the funds to bring our dream to the streets. Think of it like an ice cream truck, only slingin' ink and fresh t-shirt flavor for days. Go go go!

Help Fund DC's 1st Mobile Screen Printing TRUCK!


Live screen printing is a fun way to make art and art education accessible
to all communities and people of all ages and skill levels.


Help Us Make This Party-to-Go a Reality

Soul & Ink launched last March and in just seven months, we’ve been booked
back-to-back activating all types of events including: National Cherry Blossom Festival, Global Citizen’s Earth Day, University of Maryland’s NextNow Fest and Discovery Wellness Expo.


During this time we discovered that our concept is in demand and learned a lot about how to improve our process. We are ready to take the customer experience to the next level, but now we need your help to expand.

We are self-taught screen printers who started out in our basement using a small one-arm press, hanging t-shirts to dry on a clothesline, but we have the professional design chops and non-stop work ethic to make this dream happen.

How You Can Support

Every dollar counts! The perks you will receive for your contributions are the sweet rewards listed on the right-hand column. Scroll down to peep the design menu to design your own t-shirt! Your contribution plays a critical role in bringing The First Fully Equipped Live Screen Printing Studio on Wheels to the DC Area while also supporting a local, minority-owned small business. Crowdfunding allows you to become involved in our creative venture. As a contributor you will receive exclusive updates and can even take part in the design process! It also enables us to be debt-free and self-employed, while offering a unique art form and experience to the community.


About Soul & Ink

Soul & Ink provides a fun, interactive art experience for all types of events. As the premiere live screen printing business in the DC area, we can activate any space with a four-color press, ink, apparel and one-of-a-kind imagery. It's our passion to create custom artwork that can be shared with anyone, anywhere.


Soul & Ink is the brainchild of husband and wife award-winning design team,
Frankie and Sherry Meneses. As advocates of design for social change, they were determined to find a way to be involved directly in the community. They were inspired to create a mobile screen printing set-up after seeing how stoked their friends were at screen printing parties they hosted at home. It was an instant hit! 

Participants don’t have to be trained artists to take pride in an original piece they help create. Live screen printing takes events to the next level, with an undeniable cool factor and an interactive experience that leaves crowds buzzing for days.


What We Need to Grow

Our goal is to raise $30,000 to bring this project to life. We'll be able to upgrade our do-it-yourself homemade studio into a professional, well-equipped, screen printing studio on-the-go.

Your donation will allow us to offer a wider range of services more efficiently: 

  • Increasing the quantity of printable units per hour 
  • Decreasing wear and tear on valuable equipment 
  • Improving the quality of our art and prints
  • Advancing efficiency in labor and production for staff
  • Increasing our capacity for in-house printing capabilities
  • Expanding our travel range to be able to cover a larger demographic

Mobile. The most important item we are trying to attain is a step van ($12,000) that we can customize into our mobile studio. The customization will include retrofitting the interior to become our rollin’ lab. It will house a modified printing press, a portable conveyer dryer, a washout sink, built-in clothing racks and shelves to hold the equipment as we move swiftly from one location to another. 

More specifically we need one raceway six-arm press ($950), two Vastex D-100 conveyer dryers ($1,475 each), new display banners ($300) and storage equipment ($700). Our goal is to dispatch up to two teams on any given day to cover the number of requests we receive. This equipment will be run by our second street team who we are currently in the process of training.

***The truck will be also tricked out with a fresh new paint job ($2000) by none other than DC's finest, Cita Sadeli CHELOVE, and a booming sound system ($800) to keep the party bumpin'.*** 

Print. We are also looking to purchase a Riley Hopkins six-arm two-station press ($1,700). These presses are more industrial, so we can run bigger jobs longer in our print studio. We will need a washout booth ($450) and new table top exposure unit ($395) to ensure the artwork meets our high quality control standards.

Technology. We would like to upgrade our digital equipment with a new inkjet printer with Accurip software ($999), a Macbook pro ($2000) and a two Surface Pro 4 tablets ($700 each). The inkjet printer will move us into the next phase of our screen printing design capabilities. We will be able to offer all-over printing and four-color process printing. The new digital systems will increase our speed and we'll be able to provide high-quality artwork sooner.


What You Will Receive in Return

*A #TEEMIX is our slang for a t-shirt remixed...Soul & Ink style.* 
Soul & Ink teemixes are exclusive to our live events in the DC area, but now is your chance to get your hands on an original custom shirt designed to fit your style.

By pledging a donation, you will receive designer hand made goods from
Soul & Ink. As the donation amount increases, you will receive more substantial bonuses. Here are a few examples of our SWAGADELIC PERKS:

  • $20 | LIMITED EDITION POSTERS Original art hand-pulled on archival quality 12" x 18" French paper ready to hang in your home.
  • $50 | TWO TEEMIXES Choose your shirt, color, size, location and up to two designs from the design menu below.
  • $100 | T-SHIRT BONUS PACK Special limited edition pack of two teemixes,
    a sticker pack and one poster. This gets you a little bit of everything!
  • $500 | COLLABORATE WITH US Everyone has a great shirt idea! Let's work together to come up with YOUR design and print them on 25 shirts.
  • $1,500 | SOUL & INK LIVE We will custom design 4 images based around the event theme and live screen print up to 50 shirts as a special thank you for
    your support.  

Love our idea and ready to see us pull up to a bumper near you? Well what are ya waiting for? Click a "Get This Perk" button on the right!


DESIGN MENU

Live Screen Printing is Perfect for Bringing Your Event to Life

Brand Activation | Experiential Marketing | Pop-Up Shops | Music & Film Festivals Launch Parties | Fundraisers | Private Parties | Creative Workshops 
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs | Art & Cultural Performances | Conventions | Company Team Building | VIP Rooms | Plus Much More

Risks & Challenges

By nature, live screen printing is a risky adventure. Every time you step out of the door, screens and equipment in hand you will always run into the little problems associated with events and live performance. Even with constant communication with event coordinators we have come across issues with obtaining electricity, loud noise, crowded spaces, weather, under-booked venues, confusion as to who we are and what we're doing. 

We have learned to be flexible and think way outside of the box. We are fast on our feet and have the experience and resourcefulness to overcome every obstacle that stands in the way of making an event successful and continue innovating.

Our new equipment and vehicle will be an integral part of our growth and eliminate many of the challenges we have come across.

~Testimonials~

We'd like to take a moment to thank our media sponsors for believing in us enough to partner with us on fundraising events and on a promotional level. Here's a few who took a moment to vouch for us after working together at live events:  

"Soul & Ink is 'love-in-action.' We are committed to building communities that give life to printmaking and Soul & Ink are great partners on this journey. It is great to see them engage people of all ages and abilities in the transformative process
of screen printing." -Jose Dominguez, Executive Director

"Soul & Ink brings a unique and dynamic element to the DC metro area arts community. Not only are Sherry and Frank outstanding collaborative partners,
but they are also exceptionally talented artists in their own right. Most importantly, they are passionate, small business owners who bring energy and creativity
to every event." -Bronwyn King, Co-Founder

"What an awesome adventure it is to work with Soul & Ink Crew! We pARTner with them whenever we can because they offer beautiful, thoughtful, one of a kind products made with 100% love. Frankie and Sherry are also the most wonderful humans you will ever meet. They are the real deal, and completely deserve our support!" -Emily Arden Eakland, Director

“As a branding agency we are constantly looking for like-minded creatives to partner with, Soul & Ink was love at first sight… As an experience brand that breathes new life into live events we knew right away this was a company we wanted to align with and be apart of their future success. We look forward to this next exciting phase of their brand - it’s gonna be monumental!”
-Erik Hansen, Co-Founder, Chief Brand Officer


~Local FUNdraiser Events~

As an added bonus we've partnered with our sponsors for these special events:

11/6 DCPodfest | 6-8 PM We’re launching our indiegogo campaign with a
T-Shirt Printing Party with the podcast community. 
www.dcpodfest.com

11/14 Ink It Up! 2nd Biennial Print Symposium | 3-5 PM Guests will be invited to experience the excitement of live screen printing by designing their own poster while learning more about print innovation at other demos being offered.
www.pyramidatlanticartcenter.org

12/5 D.I.Y. HOLIDAY GIFT MAKING WORKSHOP | 12-2 PM We’ll provide pro tips on how to set up your own D.I.Y. screen printing studio, including a hands-on holiday art & print demo where guests design a choice of a poster or a set of cards.
 www.recreativespaces.com

12/12 May the Art Be With You: A Tribute to a Galaxy Far, Far Away
ART SHOW | 5-10 PM A touchstone for every generation, Star Wars and its
epic tale of the hero’s journey, captures our imaginations.
www.studiosohy.com

12/19 SLACKERS D.I.Y. HOLIDAY SCREEN PRINTING & LETTERPRESS WORKSHOP | 1-3 PM Get pro tips on building your own D.I.Y. screen printing set up, followed by making last minute holiday gifts. We're partnering with Pyramid Atlantic to offer both screen printing and letterpress hands-on holiday art
& printing. Guests design a choice of a poster or a set of cards. 
www.thefridgedc.com


Help Us Spread the Word! 

Every dollar counts, but even if you can't donate, you can show support by helping spread the word. Share with your social media network, forward on our newsletter, repost, retweet or by good ol' fashioned word of mouth.
Stay connected for updates on our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.
Visit our website at www.soulandinkcrew.com

Thanks so much for your support. We can't do this without you.


Soulfully yours,

Live screen printing is a fun way to make art and art education accessible to all communities and people of all ages and skill levels.



Help Us Make This Party-to-Go a Reality
Soul & Ink launched last March and in just seven months, we’ve been booked back-to-back activating all types of events including: National Cherry Blossom Festival, Global Citizen’s Earth Day, University of Maryland’s NextNow Fest and Discovery Wellness Expo.


During this time we discovered that our concept is in demand and learned a lot about how to improve our process. We are ready to take the customer experience to the next level, but now we need your help to expand.
We are self-taught screen printers who started out in our basement using a small one-arm press, hanging t-shirts to dry on a clothesline, but we have the professional design chops and non-stop work ethic to make this dream happen.

How You Can Support Every dollar counts! The perks you will receive for 
your contributions are the sweet rewards listed on the right-hand 
column. Scroll down to peep the design menu to design your own t-shirt! Your contribution plays a critical role in 
bringing The First Fully Equipped Live Screen Printing Studio on Wheels to the DC Area while also supporting a local, minority-owned small business.
Crowdfunding allows you to become involved in our creative venture. 
As a contributor you will receive exclusive updates and can even take 
part in the design process! It also enables us to be debt-free and 
self-employed, while offering a unique art form and experience to the 
community.


About Soul & Ink


Soul
 & Ink provides a fun, interactive art experience for all types of 
events. As the premiere live screen printing business in the DC area, we
 can activate any space with a four-color press, ink, apparel and 
one-of-a-kind imagery. It's our passion to create custom artwork that 
can be shared with anyone, anywhere. 
Soul & Ink is the brainchild of husband and wife award-winning design team, Frankie
 and Sherry Meneses. As advocates of design for social change, they were
 determined to find a way to be involved directly in the community. They
 were inspired to create a mobile screen printing set-up after seeing 
how stoked their friends were at screen printing parties they hosted at 
home. It was an instant hit! 

Participants don’t have to be trained artists to take pride in 
an original piece they help create. Live screen printing takes events to
 the next level, with an undeniable cool factor and an interactive 
experience that leaves crowds buzzing for days.


What We Need to Grow

Our goal is to raise $30,000 to bring this project to life. We'll be able to upgrade our do-it-yourself homemade studio into a professional, well-equipped, screen printing studio on-the-go.

Your donation will allow us to offer a wider range of services more efficiently: 

Increasing the quantity of printable units per hour 
Decreasing wear and tear on valuable equipment 
Improving the quality of our art and prints
Advancing efficiency in labor and production for staff
Increasing our capacity for in-house printing capabilities
Expanding our travel range to be able to cover a larger demographic

Mobile. The most important item we are trying to attain is a step van ($12,000) that we can customize into our mobile studio. The customization will include retrofitting the interior to become our rollin’ lab. It will house a modified printing press, a portable conveyer dryer, a washout sink, built-in clothing racks and shelves to hold the equipment as we move swiftly from one location to another. 

More specifically we need one raceway six-arm press ($950), two Vastex D-100 conveyer dryers ($1,475 each), new display banners ($300) and storage equipment ($700). Our goal is to dispatch up to two teams on any given day to cover the number of requests we receive. This equipment will be run by our second street team who we are currently in the process of training.
***The truck will be also tricked out with a fresh new paint job ($2000) by none other than DC's finest, Cita Sadeli CHELOVE, and a booming sound system ($800) to keep the party bumpin'.*** 

Print. We are also looking to purchase a Riley Hopkins six-arm two-station press ($1,700). These presses are more industrial, so we can run bigger jobs longer in our print studio. We will need a washout booth ($450) and new table top exposure unit ($395) to ensure the artwork meets our high quality control standards.


Technology. We would like to upgrade our digital equipment with a new inkjet printer with Accurip software ($999), a Macbook pro ($2000) and a two Surface Pro 4 tablets ($700 each). The inkjet printer will move us into the next phase of our screen printing design capabilities. We will be able to offer all-over printing and four-color process printing. The new digital systems will increase our speed and we'll be able to provide high-quality artwork sooner.What You Will Receive in Return




*A #TEEMIX is our slang for a t-shirt remixed...Soul & Ink style.* Soul & Ink teemixes are exclusive to our live events in the DC area, but now is your chance to get your hands on an original custom shirt designed to fit your style.

By pledging a donation, you will receive designer hand made goods from Soul & Ink. As the donation amount increases, you will receive more substantial bonuses. Here are a few examples of our SWAGADELIC PERKS:


$20 | LIMITED EDITION POSTERS Original art hand-pulled on archival quality 12" x 18" French paper ready to hang in your home.

$50 | TWO TEEMIXES Choose your shirt, color, size, location and up to two designs from the design menu below.
$100 | T-SHIRT BONUS PACK Special limited edition pack of two teemixes, a sticker pack and one poster. This gets you a little bit of everything!

$500 | COLLABORATE WITH US Everyone has a great shirt idea! Let's work together to come up with YOUR design and print them on 25 shirts.

$1,500 | SOUL & INK LIVE We will custom design 4 images based around the event theme and live screen print up to 50 shirts as a special thank you for your support.  

Love our idea and ready to see us pull up to a bumper near you? Well what are ya waiting for? Click a "Get This Perk" button on the right!
DESIGN MENU





Live Screen Printing is Perfect for Bringing Your Event to Life
Brand Activation | Experiential Marketing | Pop-Up Shops | Music & Film Festivals Launch Parties | Fundraisers | Private Parties | Creative Workshops Bar/Bat Mitzvahs | Art & Cultural Performances | Conventions | Company Team Building | VIP Rooms | Plus Much More
Risks & Challenges

By nature, live screen printing is a risky adventure. Every time you step out of the door, screens and equipment in hand you will always run into the little problems associated with events and live performance. Even with constant communication with event coordinators we have come across issues with obtaining electricity, loud noise, crowded spaces, weather, under-booked venues, confusion as to who we are and what we're doing. 
We have learned to be flexible and think way outside of the box. We are fast on our feet and have the experience and resourcefulness to overcome every obstacle that stands in the way of making an event successful and continue innovating.
Our new equipment and vehicle will be an integral part of our growth and eliminate many of the challenges we have come across.
~Testimonials~We'd like to take a moment to thank our media sponsors for believing in us enough to partner with us on fundraising events and on a promotional level. Here's a few who took a moment to vouch for us after working together at live events:  


"Soul & Ink is 'love-in-action.' We are committed to building communities that give life to printmaking and Soul & Ink are great partners on this journey. It is great to see them engage people of all ages and abilities in the transformative process of screen printing." -Jose Dominguez, Executive Director








"Soul & Ink brings a unique and dynamic element to the DC metro area arts community. Not only are Sherry and Frank outstanding collaborative partners, but they are also exceptionally talented artists in their own right. Most importantly, they are passionate, small business owners who bring energy and creativity to every event." -Bronwyn King, Co-Founder





"What an awesome adventure it is to work with Soul & Ink Crew! We pARTner with them whenever we can because they offer beautiful, thoughtful, one of a kind products made with 100% love. Frankie and Sherry are also the most wonderful humans you will ever meet. They are the real deal, and completely deserve our support!" -Emily Arden Eakland, Director

“As a branding agency we are constantly looking for like-minded creatives to partner with, Soul & Ink was love at first sight… As an experience brand that breathes new life into live events we knew right away this was a company we wanted to align with and be apart of their future success. We look forward to this next exciting phase of their brand - it’s gonna be monumental!” -Erik Hansen, Co-Founder, Chief Brand Officer




~Local FUNdraiser Events~

As an added bonus we've partnered with our sponsors for these special events:
11/6 DCPodfest | 6-8 PM We’re launching our indiegogo campaign with a T-Shirt Printing Party with the podcast community. www.dcpodfest.com
11/14 Ink It Up! 2nd Biennial Print Symposium | 3-5 PM Guests will be invited to experience the excitement of live screen printing by designing their own poster while learning more about print innovation at other demos being offered.www.pyramidatlanticartcenter.org
12/5 D.I.Y. HOLIDAY GIFT MAKING WORKSHOP | 12-2 PM We’ll provide pro tips on how to set up your own D.I.Y. screen printing studio, including a hands-on holiday art & print demo where guests design a choice of a poster or a set of cards. www.recreativespaces.com
12/12 May the Art Be With You: A Tribute to a Galaxy Far, Far Away ART SHOW | 5-10 PM A touchstone for every generation, Star Wars and its epic tale of the hero’s journey, captures our imaginations. www.studiosohy.com
12/19 SLACKERS D.I.Y. HOLIDAY SCREEN PRINTING & LETTERPRESS WORKSHOP | 1-3 PM Get pro tips on building your own D.I.Y. screen printing set up, followed by making last minute holiday gifts. We're partnering with Pyramid Atlantic to offer both screen printing and letterpress hands-on holiday art & printing. Guests design a choice of a poster or a set of cards. www.thefridgedc.com


Help Us Spread the Word! 

Every dollar counts, but even if you can't donate, you can show support by helping spread the word. Share with your social media network, forward on our newsletter, repost, retweet or by good ol' fashioned word of mouth. Stay connected for updates on our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.Visit our website at www.soulandinkcrew.com
Thanks so much for your support. We can't do this without you.Soulfully yours,

story:
Hi! My name is OAK from THAILAND
Now I'm working in Telecommunication Company.

One day while I’m using social network (Facebook, Instagram)
I saw a lot of people decorate their photos with a cute stamps
, so I got an idea that if we can change the stamp in to the logo or campaign of the brand.
It will help brand to advertisement themselves through people in social network without hard sale.

, So I create application called FOZY (Prototype)
Fozy is free photo stamps application that come with the concept
"Everyone can have their own stamp"

- For the User or Designer: Free (Must be Qualify first) 
- For the Brand or Company can Sponsor to have it.
(*the income is come from Sponsor)

You can download prototype at...
- iOS: http://goo.gl/kknxCV
- Android: http://goo.gl/xcUUHh

After I create my prototype application for 6 months.
There are a lot of thing to develop such as update Operating System, Fix Bug, create new function, so I would like to raise fund for the next development phase
(Full Function and ready for the business)

Application developer's cost is around 6,500 dollar,
 job descriptions are as followings
- Update the latest operating system both iOS and Android
- Change the layout of sticker shop from 1 to 3 Sticker collection in row
- Create Top Chart , New Arrival Stickers
- Create a space to add banner for google ads
- Create Search, Sort sticker Function in menu
- Create More Frame
- Create Flip Function of sticker
- Create delete sticker function after download the sticker
- Create tutorial
- Add more Font and stroke function
- Fix some bug
- Develop back-end system for manage the sticker on shelf
   and make it more easily to use
- Develop Website to support operation work (upload sticker system)
.................................................

5 USD : 
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
10 USD : 
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 1 Stamp Space in Sponsor Collection in my app.
   (Send me any pic you want)
25 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 1 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 1 Stamp Space in Sponsor Collection in my app.
50 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 2 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 2 Stamp Space in Sponsor Collection in my app.
100 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 4 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 4 Stamp Space in Sponsor Collection in my app.
200 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 8 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 8 Stamp Space in Sponsor Collection in my app.
500 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 20 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 1 Collection Stamp Space in my app. (Own your Collection with 16 Stamp Space)
1,000 USD :
- Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
- 40 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 1 Collection Stamp Space in my app. (Own your Collection with 40 Stamp Space)
6,500 USD :
- Super Huge Special THANKS on FOZY Web-site and Application.
   (You will become our main sponsor)
- 40 Digital Drawing from my partner Designer. 
- 1 Collection Stamp Space in my app. (Own your Collection with 40 Stamp Space)
- All Banner in app Link to your Collection
  (Everyone who use app will know you are the main sponsor)

*My Partner Designers 

 www.facebook.com/SIRI.drawing

 www.facebook.com/samuiiraiwa

 www.facebook.com/ChaaaClosebeta

 www.facebook.com/blabeer

(Choose 1 & send me any pic that you want to draw)


.................................................
Finally!
If I success to raise fund with this campaign by develop this app, the advertisement society will have another media option to promote their brand, Campaign or Product without hard sale and boring style... 

…But FUN ^^

story:
Please scroll for English

Мне всегда не хватало такого места, чтобы там уютно как дома, гамаки и тюфяки, микроскоп и проектор, радиодетали и вязальные спицы, карта мира во всю стену и мольберт, и набор юного физика, и люди из самых разных стран — рассказывают про связь стандартной модели и теории струн, учат чинить велосипеды, обсуждают экономические аспекты феминизма и придумывают 20 способов использования старых коробок. Монтессори-среда для взрослых. Место обитания увлеченных и любопытных. Саморазвитие и импульс социальных изменений в веселой и непринужденной атмосфере.

Но гора к Магомету не пришла, поэтому Магомет сам лепит себе гору.

Где?

Львов.

Что?

В первую очередь антикафе: свободное пространство с плюшками и напитками, где оплачивается только время пребывания. Во вторую первую очередь — хостел: бюджетный ночлег и дом вдали от дома.

Зачем и как?

  • Мостик между культурами. Общее пространство для бороздящих просторы планеты и местных обитателей, интернациональные ужины, презентации необычных путешествий.
  • Приют мозголомов. Лекции, обсуждения, актуальная научно-популярная периодика, вечера знакомств.
  • Видео-остров. Большой экран и отобранная вручную коллекция качественных фильмов, документалок и образовательных роликов.
  • Плацдарм для саморазвития. Языковые клубы, учебные группы, самоучители, конструкторы, наглядные пособия.
  • Разгон креативности. Мастер-классы, инструменты и материалы для ремёсел, рукоделий и художеств.
  • Убежище трудоголиков. Тихая комната, где можно сочинять эссе, писать программы, готовиться к презентации или просто копаться в мыслях за чашкой чая.

Шаг первый: финансирование. Меняю ваши денежные знаки и ободряющие флюиды на отличные Фибоначчи-бонусы:)

И еще: помощь с пиаром важна не меньше финансовой помощи, так что не забудьте рассказать о Brainy Night своим друзьям!


I always felt like there is a place missing, cozy as home, with hammocks and mats, a microscope and a projector, a radio building kit and knitting needles, a wall-big world map and a drawing easel, and with people from different countries — explaining the connection between the Standard Model and the String Theory, teaching how to fix a bike, discussing the economic implications of feminism and finding 20 new uses to an old box. Montessori environment for adults. A habitat of enthusiastic and curious people. Self-development and drive for social change in a fun and relaxed atmosphere.

But no mountain came to Muhammad, so Muhammad is putting his own mountain together.

Where?

Lviv, Ukraine.

What?

On one hand, it’s a time-café: open space with snacks and beverages, where you pay just for the time you spend there. On the other hand, it’s a hostel: budget accommodation and a home away from home.

How and why?

  • Bridge between cultures. A common space for those who plow through the vastness of our planet and for local dwellers, international dinners, presentations of unusual travel projects.
  • Nerd haven. Lectures, discussions, popular science magazines, geek-dating.
  • Video island. Big screen and a hand-picked collection of quality movies, documentaries and educational videos.
  • Staging area for self-development. Language clubs, study groups, self-teaching guides, science kits and other useful props.
  • Creativity boost. Workshops, tools and materials for arts and crafts.
  • Workaholic refuge. A quite room where you can write essays, develop software, prepare a report or just rummage in your thoughts over a cup of tea.

Step one: financing. I’m trading your currency and encouraging vibes for wonderful Fibonacci-perks.

And one more thing: spreading the word is no less important than financial help, so don't forget to tell your friends about Brainy Night!
